overview.title: Overview
overview.content: This template is provided as-is for use in web development projects. By using this template, you agree to these terms.

permitted.title: You may:
permitted.personal: Use this template in personal and commercial projects
permitted.modify: Modify the template for your needs

prohibited.title: You may not:
prohibited.claim: Claim this template as your original work
prohibited.liability: Hold the template creators liable for issues

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: This template is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind. No guarantees are made regarding suitability for any purpose.

privacyPolicy.description: Privacy policy and data handling practices for the VERT Stack Template

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: The VERT Stack Template is designed with privacy in mind.

storage.title: Local Storage
storage.noSensitive: No sensitive data is stored by default

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: The template includes security headers configuration, XSS protection measures, and CSRF prevention setup.
